feedback.fit: The slim fit t-shirt and mini skirt create a youthful, trendy silhouette that flatters her figure.
feedback.color: The black, white and purple color scheme has an edgy vibe but could use another pop of color for more visual interest.
feedback.footwear: The lace-up ankle boots complement the outfit's edgy style and elongate her legs.
feedback.accessories: Some bold jewelry like a chunky necklace or stacked bracelets could elevate the look further.
feedback.style: Overall it's a cute, edgy casual look that suits her youthful style. A few small tweaks could take it to the next level.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the striped tee and skinny jeans is comfortable and laid-back, but could be more figure-flattering.
feedback.color: The black, white and denim blue palette is classic, but the outfit lacks a vibrant focal point.
feedback.footwear: The pop of red from the ankle boots adds a nice touch of contrast and pulls the look together.
feedback.accessories: The leather satchel and beret give a nod to French girl style, but the beret looks a bit costumey.
feedback.style: It's a decent attempt at casual French-inspired style, but fit and proportions could be improved for more polish.

feedback.fit: The fitted tee and shorts hug her curves in all the right places, creating a polished, put-together silhouette.
feedback.color: The cream, red and white color combo is fresh and crisp - perfect for summer. The red shorts make a bold statement.
feedback.footwear: You can't go wrong with classic white sneakers - they ground the look and keep it casual.
feedback.accessories: The sunglasses and shoulder bag are practical additions that enhance the outfit's easy, breezy vibe.
feedback.style: This is preppy casual done right - it's simple but intentional, well-fitting and very flattering. No notes!

feedback.fit: The loose fitting blouse and relaxed denim shorts give the outfit an effortless boho feel, but the blouse may be slightly oversized on her petite frame.
feedback.color: The orange and blue color scheme is fun and eye-catching. The pattern mixing between the blouse and bag adds bohemian flair.
feedback.footwear: The bright yellow sandals are an unexpected choice that work well with the outfit's free-spirited vibe.
feedback.accessories: The printed tote bag ties in nicely with the blouse and completes the carefree, artistic look.
feedback.style: This outfit captures the essence of boho style with its bright colors, prints and flowy silhouette. Slightly more fitted pieces would refine the overall effect.

feedback.fit: The oversized blazer overwhelms her petite figure and disrupts her proportions, making her legs look very short.
feedback.color: The coral and black is a striking, night-appropriate combo, but the colors don't harmonize that well.
feedback.footwear: The taupe platform heels elongate her legs, which helps balance out the blazer, but a sleeker shoe would be more flattering.
feedback.accessories: The look feels incomplete without any accessories. A clutch and some jewelry would go a long way.
feedback.style: The outfit has potential as a flirty going out look, but fit issues are holding it back. A cropped, fitted jacket and some styling tweaks would improve it.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the lace blouse paired with skinny jeans creates a balanced, flattering silhouette that highlights her figure without being too tight.
feedback.color: The soft blush pink and white color palette is romantic and feminine. The tan bag adds a nice neutral touch.
feedback.footwear: The nude flats elongate her legs and complement the feminine aesthetic of the outfit.
feedback.accessories: The leather tote is a practical, stylish accessory that doesn't compete with the delicate lace blouse.
feedback.style: This outfit perfectly embodies feminine style with its lace details, soft colors and fitted yet relaxed silhouette. Flawless execution!

feedback.fit: The fitted blouse and skinny jeans hug her curves and create an attractive, put-together silhouette.
feedback.color: You can't go wrong with a classic blue and white color scheme. The printed blouse adds some visual interest.
feedback.footwear: The wedge sandals dress up the look a bit while still being casual and comfortable for daytime.
feedback.accessories: The tote bag and sunglasses are practical, stylish additions for a polished weekend look.
feedback.style: This outfit strikes the perfect balance between casual and chic. The fitted pieces and elevated accessories make it ideal for brunches or casual days out.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the denim jacket and flowy maxi dress suits her tall figure and gives off an effortlessly cool vibe.
feedback.color: The black and denim blue color palette is easy to wear but on the dark side for summer. The outfit could use a lighter shade or pop of color.
feedback.footwear: The gladiator sandals work with the boho style and make the long dress more casual and walkable.
feedback.accessories: The shoulder bag is cute and functional. Some additional boho accessories like layered necklaces would be welcome.
feedback.style: This look channels boho style through the maxi dress, denim jacket and gladiator sandals. With a few small tweaks, it could be an easygoing summer uniform.

feedback.fit: The tunic dress looks oversized and frumpy on her, obscuring her shape. A more fitted silhouette would be much more flattering.
feedback.color: The green and white print is fun, but paired with black leggings and flats, the overall effect is drab and heavy, especially for summer.
feedback.footwear: The black flats get lost in the outfit and weigh it down. A lighter, more summery shoe would improve the look.
feedback.accessories: The black bag blends in and doesn't add much. A contrasting bag in a lighter neutral would break up the dark colors.
feedback.style: While comfy and practical, the overall outfit lacks polish. Rethinking the fit, colors and styling would take this from frumpy to weekend chic.

feedback.fit: The fitted red blouse and white shorts show off her figure nicely and create a crisp, put-together silhouette perfect for summer.
feedback.color: You can't beat red, white and tan for a classic summer color palette. The vibrant red blouse makes a striking focal point against the white shorts.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedge sandals elongate her legs and dress up the shorts a bit, making this ideal for many summer occasions.
feedback.accessories: The straw tote is a quintessential summer accessory that adds a casual, beachy touch.
feedback.style: This look is summer casual perfection. The fitted, colorful pieces, breezy shorts and seasonally appropriate accessories nail the aesthetic.
